summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of June 2018. keyFacts: The account balance as of June 30, 2018, was $3,332,938.70.
Significant transactions included multiple outgoing transfers to JPMorgan Chase Bank and Wells Fargo Bank.
The document details various ATM withdrawals and check purchases throughout June 2018.
There are multiple mentions of preauthorized debits related to American Express payments.
The document is marked as confidential and is subject to legal protections under federal rules.
